topic.title: LAK SFR CNC: Activate Boundary Condition Packages

para.text: LAK SFR CNC: Activate Boundary Condition Packages
Select "Model|MODFLOW Packages and Programs" and activate the CHD, Recharge, Lake, Water Mover, and Streamflow Routing packages. In the Recharge package, set the recharge location to the top layer.
